previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Vancouver Whitecaps | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA will be aiming to get their season back on track in a bid to move up the Western Conference table when they play host to a Vancouver Whitecaps FC in the thick of the playoff hunt as the clubs meet Saturday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs Vancouver Whitecaps FC

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 9': Beitashour made a nice move to get the ball into the #ChivasUSA area from the right flank, but it was cleared by the defense.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Jordan Harvey.
Delay in match Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Erick Torres can not squeeze his shot past Ousted

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Mattocks took a hit. He's on on his feet now walking a bit gingerly. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: A little bit of misdirection allowed Cubo to get a shot off. Saved. Torres has four goals in three games against #vwfc #chvvan

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Erick Torres sends a shot right at Ousted

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Borja makes a good dribble but Delgado not able to receive the pass #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Agustín Pelletieri.

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Goats doing a good job changing direction in this match but the 'Caps have shown an usual amount of effort on D #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Brenton Walters
timelineItems.text: Retweeting: Ousted has the best rebound control in MLS. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Marco Delgado with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 15' - Some incisive play from the @WhitecapsFC, but @cdchivasusa laying off and keeping the visitors in front of them. 0-0. #CHVvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: ⚽❤breanna bonilla❤⚽
timelineItems.text: Finally here ❤️⚽️ #chivasUSA #soccer

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sebastian Fernandez.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Sebastian Fernandez laces a long range shot at Kennedy

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Chivas USA 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: Disappointing performance from #VWFC tonite if they wanna make the playoffs they have to beat teams like Chivas

timelineItems.name: Elysha♡
timelineItems.text: A scoreless game but let's be positive, it could have been worse... #VWFC #istillloveya

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA will be aiming to get their season back on track in a bid to move up the Western Conference table when they play host to a Vancouver Whitecaps FC in the thick of the playoff hunt as the clubs meet Saturday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs Vancouver Whitecaps FC | August 16, 2014

timelineItems.name: Pietro de Santis
timelineItems.text: Cubo Torres should be playing in Europe. He's such a talented young player. #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jordan Harvey.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: I miss the old #mls passing matrix. Anecdotally Nathan Sturgis is completing a lot of difficult passes #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Omar Salgado (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the center of the box is saved in the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy dives to keep out an Omar Salgado header

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Chivas has ample space on the right side, but just seem unable to find anyone inside. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Dwyer was tied with Cubo pre #SKCvTOR. Meaning Cubo will need a brace to keep the pace. I did say he has 4 goals in 3 games against #vwfc?

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Donny Toia.
Attempt saved. Omar Salgado (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Russell Teibert with a cross.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 27': #VWFC corner coming up after Fernandez and Laba forced #ChivasUSA with some nice movement.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jordan Harvey.
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Jordan Harvey tries a through ball, but Darren Mattocks is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chivas needs to work on their clearances. Lucky to be even now, but the checks in the mail that's for sure #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Pippa
timelineItems.text: God bless whoever made the fabric decisions on this year's uniforms. #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.

timelineItems.name: FTBL Podcast
timelineItems.text: We don’t really have to argue about Salgado being an upgrade from Hurtado, right? #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: The Goats look unsettled and @WhitecapsFC need to take advantage. Salgado wasn't lined up well to connect with Teibert's corner... #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Marco Delgado.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Andy O'Brien.
Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Marco Delgado with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 30' - 'Caps need to take advantage of being on top at StubHub right now. #ChivasUSA have a habit of stinging teams unexpectedly. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: biag
timelineItems.text: Kennedy will be up for another save of the week on the Salgado attempt #VWFC

timelineItems.desc: Matias Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Matias Laba slides through Marco Delgado

timelineItems.name: Joanna Renteria™
timelineItems.text: Fútbol ⚽️ @chivasusa #Instagramworthy ? @powholaa @beeceeare #soccer #Chivasusa #chivas #futbol

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay in match Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Laba late with a challenge...and it proves costly...Argentine will be suspended for next week's @LAGalaxy game at StubHub... #CHVvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: 💋
timelineItems.text: My boy enjoying his first soccer game #ChivasUSA #VIP #InTheBox #Soccer #Game ⚽️❤️💙❤️⚽️

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Teibert down following contact with Sturgis. Foul. Sturgis one of **9** Chivas players facing possible yellow card accumulation #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marco Delgado (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Mathew Harley
timelineItems.text: Laba does so much for the 'Caps without getting any recognition #underrated #vwfc #mls

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Marco Delgado.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Coverted right back Tony Lochhead doing yeoman's work on the fragile backline. 7 clearances, 89% passing. Two minutes of added time #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Chivas USA 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Including Eriq Zavaletta, Chivas USA has one regular striker (Ryan Finley) who is not here on loan (Cubo, Barrera, Borja, Bolanos) #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Akira Kaji with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Brenton Walters
timelineItems.text: O’Brien has to read that better. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Mark Rogers
timelineItems.text: A tactical change to two up front is required. Although stretched in mf, not doing nearly enough to challenge the #ChivasUSA back 4

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Hard to miss Cubo's body language there. He thought he had that one. Heck of a cross by Kaji #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Lynn B
timelineItems.text: watching #ChivasUSA vs Vancouver Whitecaps FC at StubHub Center! #Soccer #Goal #FunEvening http://t.co/Iis2atsjZU

timelineItems.name: Jay Lahm
timelineItems.text: Seems like Ousted is going to be player of the match. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Nate Blaikie
timelineItems.text: Packed house tonight. #Intern #chivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Steven Whalley
timelineItems.text: Another listless match against a weaker opponent. The coach can't motivate his players. #robboout #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Why Why Zed
timelineItems.text: I found Waldo in the crowd in about two seconds. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Brenton Walters
timelineItems.text: Decent shift from Mezquida, but nothing too special. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: chivasusa
timelineItems.text: Know what day it is today? It's gameday! Let's go #ChivasUSA! ¿Sabes que día es hoy? Es día de partido! Vamos #ChivasUSA! #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Christian B
timelineItems.text: Caps away game but it won't stop me from wearing my #rabbittoque. Come on you Caps! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Albert Olivas
timelineItems.text: With my boo and boys.  #kids #family #soccer #chivasusa

timelineItems.text: At a soccer game. :) #soccer #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: For those asking, Koffie (ankle) didn't make the trip. And Morales (tight hamstring) is being held out of the XI as a precaution. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: Key to stopping #ChivasUSA? Stop Erick Torres. "Cubo" has 14 of team's 21 goals this season, and 4 against #VWFC in 3 career matches.

timelineItems.text: #chivasusa

timelineItems.text: Got free tickets at work for a chivas USA game.... #gametime #Chivasusa #jaylenevera

timelineItems.text: To borrow a line from Chris Berman Chivas & #vwfc appear to be playing in front of friends & well wishers at the Stubby tonite #mls

timelineItems.text: Problem with having a player the quality of Pedro Morales on the roster is that when he's not on the field everyone else looks crap. #VWFC
